Package org.apache.james.remotemanager

Provides classes implementing simple remote management facilities for James

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RemoteManagerHandlerConfigurationData Provides a number of server-wide constant values to the RemoteManagerHandlers
 

Class Summary
RemoteManager Provides a really rude network interface to administer James.
RemoteManagerHandler Provides a really rude network interface to administer James.
